batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (lower(process.name) = lower('/usr/bin/security') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('find-certificate')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' export '))) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' dump-keychain ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' login-keychain '))))

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities References: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1555.001/T1555.001.md, https://gist.github.com/Capybara/6228955
